-| wi(w0, wbr(c3, cstrkgld, nat2))

cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 = c1)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c2)
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c2)
⊣ (w0 →(c6 ` c0)=(c6 ` c1))
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c3)
⊣ c4 =(dist ` c3)
⊣ c5 =(Itv ` c3)

⊣ (w0 → c3[TarskiGDim> =]2)
⊣ c6 =((lInvG ` c3)` c7)
⊣ c8 =(LineG ` c3)
⊣ (w0 → c7 ∈ ran(c8))
⊣ d(hs0, c8)
⊣ d(hs0, w0)
